0: Restaurants are fairly good the buffet offered for lunch was good containing a fair variety of food

plenty of sun beds you do not need to get out there at 0630 sailing dinghy and other sea activities Our ground floor room was very spacious 904 Lea our cleaner always had a smile and kept it spotless Saedah on the front desk gave us guidance on what to do and where to go Godwin our waiter on Davas Restaurant was very attentive and also guided on the fish menu lots of fish to chose from Only fault was the entertainment apart from a 3 piece on the 7th floor who took lots of breaks
a la carte meals in a variety of restaurants for both lunch and dinner
who explained us the menu and informed us about the Hotel and its amenities

Really recommend this place really nice defo no problems bar staff amazing in fact all staff are amazing and hard working if anyone complains there is something wrong with then I think would defo go back

We had the most amazing holiday ever and we would highly recommend to anyone to go all inclusive as the package is amazing food is outstanding you would not even get that quality or presentation in some top restaurants in UK all branded beers are served and a lot of free watersports in the package unheard of
Also Basil The staff in the Captains Bar and the staff in the buffet restaurant were brilliant and again nothing was too much trouble
The pools are good service is second to none our favourite places where the Divas Restaurant worth the extra supplement for the 6 course fish dinner the service was excellent
Top tip Email the hotel before travel and book your restaurants before you travel
1: As a suggestion maybe have one of the swim up pool bars adults only this may give a area of peace and quiet rather than having to pay to upgrade to use restricted pool we believe this would certainly make the resort more attractive to couples

For example each hotel had different beverage menus that were not inclusive in one but then inclusive in the next it was all very confusing and stressful the staff were not as attentive or as helpful the bars were not very well managed you had to wait quite a while to get a drink and some of the new staff were just plan rude
As a couple we enjoyed the short stay but found it very hard to book a restaurant in the evening but we realise the hotel is very busy this time of year
I had to ask my husband to go and get me something else from the sports bar where he went and waited till the food will be ready to bring it for me
Just 1 small thing I think coffee and tea should be served with breakfast
They have several restaurants on the property but the menu feels limited
A medium level buffet restaurant for two adults and two kids with only one soft drink each was aprox 620 dirham
No access for VPN is not good at alFod selection very much the same every day
We d’as not enjoy the waiting for eat to IBN MAJED restaurant
Travel republic later told us that it is a standard package which pretty much just includes buffet ’s and a couple of smaller restaurants which are more like gastro pubs and bar food
